item.title: `Code` Poetry
item.description: Pseudo code poem. if (this === that): try write_new_poem() except not_a_poet as e: return e e cummings?

item.title: A Poem
item.description: Now pleasing sleep had seal’d each mortal eye, Stretch’d in the tents the Grecian leaders lie:
